official_title: A bill to permit the Secretary of Health and Human Services to waive certain recovery requirements with respect to the construction or remodeling of facilities, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Public Health Service Act to allow waiver of recovery of funds provided under the Community Mental Health Centers Act for remodeling, construction, or expansion of a facility if the facility is, within 20 years, sold or transferred to any entity that would not have been qualified to apply under such Act or which is disapproved as a transferee by the State mental health agency. Amends the Controlled Substances Act to authorize the Attorney General, on request of the chief executive officer of a State, to transfer to the State title to real property which has been civilly or criminally forfeited under the Act for use as a public area reserved for recreational or historic purposes or for the preservation of natural conditions.

titles.title: A bill to permit the Secretary of Health and Human Services to waive certain recovery requirements with respect to the construction or remodeling of facilities, and for other purposes.
